entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: WNW 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
